'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

The Watcher is teleported here during the quest [A Glimpse Beyond](/aGlimpseBeyond/), after volunteering to assist the animancers at [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/).

## Background

This deathly, cold realm belongs to [Rymrgand](/rymrgand/) and is where things come to die: Alone and afraid, separated from everyone else. As you travel through it, you will hear the last thoughts of would-be conquerors, rulers, and heroes, all consumed by the Beast of Winter.

## Points of interest

* Rymrgand, in the form of a giant stone head at the end of the zone.
